page.title: 05Glanaman Playschool.
page.content: Cwmaman Playschool began in Brynseion Chapel Vestry in 1976 and was organised by the mothers. It is now held in the Community Centre, and is attended by up to 32 children between the ages of 2 and 4. The Playschool is held on four mornings a week from 9:30 a.m. till midday. The aim of 'Ysgol Feithrin' is to teach the Welsh language through play and song to both Welsh and English speaking children. Funds are always badly needed by the Playgroup to provide both books and toys. Fund-raising events are held throughout the year. The children are often taken on interesting trips, and one of the regular events is the annual open day, when parents and others are invited to go along to see a display of the work done by the children.
